references.reason: This paper is a technical report on GPT-4, a large language model that achieved state-of-the-art results on various tasks, making it a relevant reference for advancements in deep learning.

references.paper_title: Deep-learning approach to first-principles transport simulations
references.reason: This paper explores the use of deep learning in conjunction with first-principles methods, a significant approach for improving prediction accuracy in scientific computing.

references.paper_title: MAU: A motion-aware unit for video prediction and beyond
references.reason: This paper introduces a motion-aware unit that enhances video prediction capabilities, an approach directly applicable to spatio-temporal dynamics modeling.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a generative model that is used extensively for data augmentation and generation in various fields.

references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents Glide, a diffusion model used for image generation and editing, highlighting the potential of this approach in handling complex spatio-temporal data.
